data.partBlankContent: During the 17th century, important breakthroughs in the foundations of mechanical engineering occurred in England. Sir Isaac Newton formu_____ Newton's Laws of Motion and deve_____ Calculus, the mathem______ basis o_ physics. Newton w__ reluctant t_ publish h__ works f__ years, but h_ was fin____ persuaded t_ do s_ by h__ colleagues, such a_ Sir Edmond Halley, much t_ the ben____ of a__ mankind. data.fullContent: During the 17th century, important breakthroughs in the foundations of mechanical engineering occurred in England. Sir Isaac Newton formulated Newton's Laws of Motion and developed Calculus, the mathematical basis of physics. Newton was reluctant to publish his works for years, but he was finally persuaded to do so by his colleagues, such as Sir Edmond Halley, much to the benefit of all mankind. Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz is also credited with creating Calculus during this time period.
data.answer: 17世纪，英国在机械工程的基础方面取得了重大突破。艾萨克·牛顿爵士制定了牛顿运动定律，并发展了物理学的数学基础——微积分。牛顿多年来都不愿发表自己的著作，但他的同事们，如埃德蒙·哈雷爵士，最终说服了他发表著作，这对全人类大有裨益。戈特弗里德·威廉·莱布尼茨也被认为在这一时期创造了微积分。
